job description:
Our client is an investment company that is searching for an experienced Data Scientist to join their team. This Data Scientist will play a key role in scaling and improving existing Data Science processes and technologies. This is a full time, permanent placement role that can pay between $100-120k DOE.

This Data Scientist will work in an environment where data is deeply embedded and crucial to asset identification and management. You will be part of a fast-growing data science team working to leverage data, data mining, and machine learning to impact every employee in the company and help make smarter investments.

Required Technical Experience:
  • Senior experience with Data Science and machine learning
  • Experience with hands on data analysis working with large data sets
  • Strong experience with SQL in a cloud-based environment
  • Development experience with SQL, R, Python, etc.
  • Great experience with building data processing pipelines including APIs and ETL
  • Quantitative background in Statistics, Computer Science, Math, or similar field
This is a growing company with a great reputation and work culture! For more information please reach out to Hannah May ASAP at 405-236-0202 or hannah.may.nicholas@rht.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

(Please, no C2C.)
